Container.Name: shoutrrr
Container.Overview: Notification library for gophers and their furry friends. Heavily inspired by Apprise. [br] This is a CLI tool. Please edit the **Post Arguments** accordingly. See documentation: https://containrrr.dev/shoutrrr/dev/getting-started/
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: apprise notification notify alerts webhook email sms discord telegram mattermost slack teams gotify
Container.Requires: This is a CLI tool; edit **Post Arguments** accordingly. See documentation: https://containrrr.dev/shoutrrr/dev/getting-started/
